mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rnum, PRO_NUMBER, PRO_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, PRO_NAME, CLASS_NUMBER, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_INTRO, CLASS_CONTENT, CLASS_CATEGORY_SMALL, PRO_ADDRESS, TO_CHAR(CLASS_REGISTER_DATE, 'YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일') AS CLASS_REGISTER_DATE, COALESCE(review_count, 0) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM ( SELECT p.PRO_NUMBER, p.PRO_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, p.PRO_NAME, c.CLASS_NUMBER, c.CLASS_NAME, c.CLASS_INTRO, c.CLASS_CONTENT, c.CLASS_CATEGORY_SMALL, p.PRO_ADDRESS, c.CLASS_REGISTER_DATE, COUNT(v.CLASS_NUMBER) AS review_count FROM PRO p JOIN CLASS c ON p.PRO_NUMBER = c.PRO_NUMBER AND c.CLASS_CATEGORY_SMALL = #{category} LEFT JOIN REVIEW v ON v.CLASS_NUMBER = c.CLASS_NUMBER GROUP BY p.PRO_NUMBER, p.PRO_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, p.PRO_NAME, c.CLASS_NUMBER, c.CLASS_NAME, c.CLASS_INTRO, c.CLASS_CONTENT, c.CLASS_CATEGORY_SMALL, p.PRO_ADDRESS, c.CLASS_REGISTER_DATE ) WHERE rownum <= #{endRow} ) WHERE rnum > #{startRow} ORDER BY CLASS_REGISTER_DATE desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rnum, PRO_NUMBER, PRO_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, PRO_NAME, CLASS_NUMBER, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_INTRO, CLASS_CONTENT, CLASS_CATEGORY_SMALL, PRO_ADDRESS, TO_CHAR(CLASS_REGISTER_DATE, 'YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일') AS CLASS_REGISTER_DATE, COALESCE((SELECT COUNT(CLASS_NUMBER) FROM REVIEW WHERE CLASS_NUMBER = c.CLASS_NUMBER), 0) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM ( SELECT p.PRO_NUMBER, p.PRO_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, p.PRO_NAME, c.CLASS_NUMBER, c.CLASS_NAME, c.CLASS_INTRO, c.CLASS_CONTENT, c.CLASS_CATEGORY_SMALL, p.PRO_ADDRESS, c.CLASS_REGISTER_DATE FROM PRO p JOIN CLASS c ON p.PRO_NUMBER = c.PRO_NUMBER AND c.CLASS_CATEGORY_SMALL = #{category} WHERE
c.CLASS_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
c.CLASS_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
c.CLASS_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR c.CLASS_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
) c WHERE rownum <= #{endRow} ) WHERE rnum > #{startRow} ORDER BY CLASS_REGISTER_DATE desc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS c JOIN PRO p ON p.PRO_NUMBER = c.PRO_NUMBER LEFT JOIN REVIEW r ON r.CLASS_NUMBER = c.CLASS_NUMBER and c.CLASS_CATEGORY_SMALL = #{category}
AND c.CLASS_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND c.CLASS_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
AND (c.CLASS_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR c.CLASS_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%')
